template.name: Template OS Windows SNMPv2
template.description:
Template OS Windows version: 0.15 Known Issues: description : Doesn't support In/Out 64 bit counters even thoug1h IfxTable is present: Currently, Windows gets itâ€™s interface status from MIB-2. Since these 64bit SNMP counters (ifHCInOctets, ifHCOutOctets, etc.) are defined as an extension to IF-MIB, Microsoft has not implemented it. https://social.technet.microsoft.com/Forums/windowsserver/en-US/07b62ff0-94f6-40ca-a99d-d129c1b33d70/windows-2008-r2-snmp-64bit-counters-support?forum=winservergen
version : Win2008, Win2012R2 device : description : Doesn't support ifXTable at all version : WindowsXP device : description : EtherLike MIB is not supported version : * device : *
